i am new here and have been interested in the samurai culture for 
some time, but my interest has been fulled more after seeing the 
last samurai. after seeing how hollywood portrayed the disapline and 
honer of the samurai i want to learn more. if any of you have advice 
on any good books to read where i can read about there theory and 
culture i would be thankful. one more thing could anyone help me 
find SAMURAI in japanese text? the symbol i have never seen and can 
not read japanese but if you could help would be great. thank you 
again.
